German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Borrowed from French centimètre.

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /t͡sɛntiˈmeːtər/

Alternative forms[edit]

  • Centimeter

Noun[edit]

Zentimeter m (genitive Zentimeters, plural Zentimeter)

  1. centimetre

Related terms[edit]

  • Meter
  • Dezimeter
  • Kilometer
  • Millimeter
